mapper.select: select stat_date, sum(inventory) as inventory, sum(material_weight) as material_weight from (select DATE_FORMAT(a.stat_date, '%m-%d') as stat_date, SUM(inventory) inventory, 0 as material_weight from materials_mr_coal_day_stock a where 1=1 and (#{startDate} = '' or a.stat_date >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else #{startDate} end) and (#{endDate} = '' or a.stat_date <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else #{endDate} end) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.stat_date, '%m-%d') union all select DATE_FORMAT(a.unloading_time, '%m-%d') as stat_date, 0 as inventory, sum(material_weight) as material_weight from t_production_material_unloading_performance a where 1=1 and (#{startDate} = '' or a.unloading_time >= case when #{startDate} = '' then null else concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') end) and (#{endDate} = '' or a.unloading_time <= case when #{endDate} = '' then null else concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59') end) group by DATE_FORMAT(a.unloading_time, '%m-%d') ) as a group by stat_date order by stat_date
